Package echo.evs.web

Class PollEditBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • echo.evs.web.PollEditBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    @ViewScoped
@Named
public class PollEditBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represent the actions over a Poll when editing a poll
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPoll

        public echo.evs.dto.Poll getPoll()
        lazily loads the Poll with the specified UUID. Creates a new poll if uuid is new. Also sets up all Sets used for duplicate testing if a poll is received (e.g email string list, question title list,..) Will also load the participant lists of the organizer so that user can import these later on
        Returns:
        the Poll DTO

      • storePoll

        public void storePoll()
        Stores the (edited) Poll. If it could not be stored it will set the failure message accordingly

      • isPollPrepared

        public boolean isPollPrepared()
        Checks whether the poll is in state Prepared
        Returns:
        true if the poll is in state PREPARED and false otherwise

      • isPollStarted

        public boolean isPollStarted()
        Checks whether the poll is in state Started
        Returns:

      • importParticipantLists

        public void importParticipantLists()
        Import the participants of the selected participant lists. Also checks that no email is entered twice.

      • addNewParticipant

        public void addNewParticipant()
        Adds a new participant to the poll. Also checks if email is already in the list and does not add it if so

      • addNewQuestion

        public void addNewQuestion​(echo.evs.enums.QuestionType questionType)
        Creates a temporary new question that has a certain type. Still has to be stored when finished with editing For Yes and no question it will already create the items.
        Parameters:
        questionType - question type of the new question

      • addNewItem

        public void addNewItem()
        Checks if it is a valid question item, and if so, it adds it to the question that is being created

      • storeNewQuestion

        public void storeNewQuestion()
        Checks if it is a valid question and if so it adds it to the poll. This question will stored permanently if poll is stored.

      • removeQuestion

        public void removeQuestion​(echo.evs.dto.Question question)
        Removes a question from the poll
        Parameters:
        question - question to be removed

      • hasEnoughVotes

        public boolean hasEnoughVotes()
        Checks if the poll has at least 3 submitted votes.
        Returns:
        true if at least 3 votes

      • isTitleAvailable

        public boolean isTitleAvailable()
        Checks if the title of a poll is available
        Returns:
        true if the title of the polls has not been taken by a previously created poll

      • sendReminders

        public void sendReminders()
        If the tracking of participants is enabled it sends reminders to participants who haven't voted yet

        Returns:
